com.appglu.android
Class CrudApi

java.lang.Object
  com.appglu.android.CrudApi
All Implemented Interfaces:
AsyncCrudOperations, CrudOperations
public final class CrudApi
extends Object
implements CrudOperations, AsyncCrudOperations

CrudApi contains create, read, update and delete operations to be applied on your tables.

Since:
1.0.0
See Also:
AppGlu, CrudOperations, AsyncCrudOperations

create

public Object create(String tableName,
                     Row row)
              throws AppGluRestClientException
Creates a new row for the specified table.

Specified by:
create in interface CrudOperations
Parameters:
tableName - the table where the row will be created
row - contains the column names and values to be used when inserting this row on the table
Throws:
AppGluRestClientException

read

public Row read(String tableName,
                Object id,
                boolean expandRelationships)
         throws AppGluRestClientException
Search the table for the specified primary key value and return the Row or return null if not found.

Specified by:
read in interface CrudOperations
Parameters:
tableName - the table name to read from
id - the primary key value of the Row you want to read
expandRelationships - If true Row will also contain the rows of relationships this table has with other tables (many-to-one, many-to-many, etc)
Returns:
the Row or null if not found
Throws:
AppGluRestClientException

readAll

public Rows readAll(String tableName,
                    boolean expandRelationships)
             throws AppGluRestClientException
Read all Rows of the specified table.

Specified by:
readAll in interface CrudOperations
Parameters:
tableName - the table name to read from
expandRelationships - If true, for each Row in List<Row>, it will also contain the rows of relationships this table has with other tables (many-to-one, many-to-many, etc)
Returns:
Rows containing a list of rows - List<Row>
Throws:
AppGluRestClientException

readAll

public Rows readAll(String tableName,
                    boolean expandRelationships,
                    ReadAllFilterArguments arguments)
             throws AppGluRestClientException
Read Rows of the specified table following the defined filter arguments.

Specified by:
readAll in interface CrudOperations
Parameters:
tableName - the table name to read from
expandRelationships - If true, for each Row in List<Row>, it will also contain the rows of relationships this table has with other tables (many-to-one, many-to-many, etc)
arguments - define limit, offset, filter and sort arguments to be applied on the rows returned
Returns:
Rows containing a list of rows - List<Row>
Throws:
AppGluRestClientException

update

public boolean update(String tableName,
                      Object id,
                      Row row)
               throws AppGluRestClientException
Updates a row for the specified table where the primary key matches the one passed as argument.

Specified by:
update in interface CrudOperations
Parameters:
tableName - the table where the row will be updated
id - the primary key value of the Row you want to update
row - contains the column names and values to be used when updating this row on the table
Returns:
true if the row was update or false if not
Throws:
AppGluRestClientException
